title: Life Howling - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Seinen   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Beastkin   Beasts   Demons   Game Elements   Gate to Another World   Gods   Level System   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Special Abilities   Survival   Transported into a Game World   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Sung Sang-young   고렘
description: At 02:00 am every day man mysteriously he finds himself forced to be in a RPG World. Fighting, Gaining skills and making friends as part of the fun. That’s not all, he can use all of that in real life. But don’t forget the situations where he has to put his life on line to survive the situation. Could he survive to the end …..?>
